name: GrappleRun
description:
This game is an very early access of a crappy game I'm working on.

This game does not have a quit button so idk just press the windows button and close the app and for all the people that are not windows then idk I'm not smart idk how you can close it, just find a way.

Well anyways hope you like my game make sure you donate and turn me into a billionaire and yeah see ya suckers.

Credits: i made the entire game but my friend Edgar gave me the name idea so thank you.
